item.title: Hello Hugo!
item.description: Hello from Hugo! If you’re reading this in your browser, good job! The file content/post/hello-hugo.md has been converted into a complete HTML document by Hugo. Isn’t that pretty nifty? A Section Here’s a simple titled section where you can place whatever information you want. You can use inline HTML if you want, but really there’s not much that Markdown can’t do. Showing off with Markdown A full cheat sheet can be found here or through Google.
